general.default_og_description: An internship log documenting my engineering internship abroad. Follow my journal entries, cultural discoveries, and technical challenges.
general.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

homepage.title: My Internship Log
homepage.welcome: Welcome to this site created to document my internship abroad. Discover the latest journal entries below.

auth.register_info: This form is only available for creating the first and only account.

static_pages.profile_intro: I am an engineering student at ESAIP, passionate about software development and new technologies. This site was created to document my internship abroad from June to August 2026.
static_pages.profile_contact_intro: Feel free to contact me or check out my other profiles:
static_pages.internship_intro: This section will be dedicated to presenting my final year internship, which will take place over 12 weeks starting June 2026.
static_pages.internship_mission_desc: [Describe the main objectives of your internship here.]
static_pages.school_item_1_title: Master's Degree in IT & Network Engineering
static_pages.school_item_1_desc: Engineering Cycle at ESAIP (Angers), specializing in Cybersecurity & Networks. 3-year program following University Diploma.
static_pages.school_project_desc: Development of this internship log using Node.js, Express, and EJS. Implemented authentication, SQLite DB, automated testing (Jest), CI/CD (GitHub Actions), and security (CSP, Helmet).
static_pages.school_item_2_desc: Operator and Multimedia Networks specialization. IUT Poitiers-Niort-Ch√¢tellerault, Ch√¢tellerault.
static_pages.school_item_3_desc: Information Systems and Digital (SIN) specialization. Rapha√´l Eliz√©, Sabl√©-sur-Sarthe.
static_pages.work_item_1_desc: Apprenticeship at the Departmental Fire and Rescue Service (SDIS 79). Managing and maintaining network infrastructure and telecommunication systems.
static_pages.work_item_2_desc: Internship at the LIAS Laboratory (Computer Science and Automation for Systems). Server administration and user support.
static_pages.whoami_bio: Passionate about IT since a young age, I am now specializing in information systems security. Curious and rigorous, I love taking on technical challenges, whether in system administration or development.

security.2fa_enabled_desc: Your account is secure. A code will be requested at each login.
security.2fa_confirm_disable: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA security?
security.2fa_step1: 1. Scan this QR Code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy...).
security.2fa_step2: 2. Enter the 6-digit code displayed by the app to validate.
security.2fa_disabled_desc: We recommend enabling two-factor authentication to protect access to your log.
security.verify_desc: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
security.onboarding_desc: We recommend enabling two-factor authentication (2FA). This protects your log by asking for a code from your phone at each login.
